input.sentences: much greater detail was put into arches in previous generations .
this arch has a depiction of christ within its layers .
other archers show scenes or famous acts .
the time necessary to create an arch with a minotaur was large | but worth it .
buildings today would benefit from this level of detail .
output.sentences: Previous generations created buildings with such detail.
The artistic layers of each structure depicted statues and persons such as Christ.
Famous archers and well known scenes are carved into the structures.
It is worth the time to explore these works of art such as the monotaur.
The level of detail in these buildings should be preserved forever.
